price: 125. Akolobaka, oh Nkolo wa ngai! Mpona nini osekwisi ngai nazali kornona te kasi yambo nazalaki kornona?
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ لِمَ حَشَرۡتَنِيٓ أَعۡمَىٰ وَقَدۡ كُنتُ بَصِيرٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi lima ḥashartanī aʿmā waqad kuntu baṣīran
